gameObjects

Class CenterCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObjects.GameObject
      • gameObjects.Camera
        • gameObjects.CenterCamera

  • public class CenterCamera
extends Camera
    A camera that centers horizontally and vertically onto a game object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CenterCamera(GameObject followObject)
      Create a new Camera that centers on a specific game object.
